name: Project: Springbunny 0.2
description:
Project: Springbunny is a 3D platformer game, where you play as a bunny character with springy shoes! Jump, bounce, rail, and zoom around the map to complete it in the best possible time!

We are releasing our prototype for free as we're looking for feedback! The feedback form is available here https://forms.gle/hiS7L8qW8GARNZsV8 and also on our discord server: https://discord.gg/943V9KV 
See you there :)
